Entries.Abigail: #$c .5#I love the way the valley looks in the rain. It makes everything feel so romantic...#I don't mind getting a little wet on days like today. Sometimes it's fun getting caught in the rain.
Entries.Haley: #$c .5#Rain storms make me feel a little anxious. I worry that I'm going to get my clothes dirty. And the thunder can be a bit scary.$s#I was really hoping to take my camera out and do some shooting today, but then it started raining. Maybe it'll be sunny again tomorrow.$u
Entries.Leah: #$c .5#Rain storms are so beautiful, don't you agree? The sky looks like a wonderful painting.#I'm fine with rainy days. If I can't hike, I'll just paint or sculpt or read a book... I'm never bored.$h
Entries.Penny: #$c .5#I just love curling up under a blanket and getting lost in a book when it rains like this. It feels like a hug.$h#This storm is actually making me feel a little sad today. I don't know what it is. I need to reflect on some things.$s
Entries.Sebastian: #$c .5#When it rains like this, I really like standing on the pier and looking out into the Gem Sea. It makes me feel a little better about things.#The best part of rainy days is that most people don't come out. It's sort of like I have the world all to myself.
Entries.Shane: #$c .5#This rain is really bringing me down. But there's not much I can do about it.#I should have just stayed in bed all day. The rain is such a downer.$s

Entries.SeedShop_Abigail_Drawers: So you think it's perfectly acceptable to rummage through someone's underpants? Come on @, close the drawer already... it's getting weird.$u
Abigail's underpants drawer. There's a purple mineral tucked among her things.
